New Records: Hardik scored 50 not out, Rishabh Pant hit five boundaries in eight balls, and India scored 196, their highest score in a T20I
Key Match Events: Rishad Hossain's dismissal turned the game in India's favor, Kuldeep Yadav took three wickets, Jasprit Bumrah contributed with two wickets and dots
Pre-Game Insights: India's batting approach with Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli, Bangladesh's reliance on Tanzim Hasan as their best bowler
Post-Match Reflections: India's strong performance and potential advancement in the World Cup, Bangladesh's struggle with the chase and key dismissals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The slow pitch conditions, India's ability to post high totals despite the conditions, Bangladesh's batting struggles
Others: The match was the 47th of the Super Eights, India's win probability was 100%, Bangladesh's was 0%
